text: Ate tuhanu ki ho'i'a ki tusim alaha de raha te kharaca nahim karade halanki sare akasa ate dharati ata nu alaha da hi rahi javega. Tuhade vicom jihare loka jitana tom ba'ada kharaca karana ate yudha karana uha unham lokam de barabara nahim ho sakade, jinham ne jitana tom pahilam kharaca kita ate yudha kita ate alaha ne sari'am nala neki da va'ada kita hai. Alaha janada hai jo kujha tusim karade ho
